name: part_002
file: tmp_【#myth4EVER】hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Concert： The Show Goes On! [CDljbqawDkw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: The members of hololive English -Myth- perform their song 'Journey Like a Thousand Years' on stage.
The MC section begins where the members greet the audience, introduce themselves, and discuss the Broadway theme of the concert venue.

subtitles.original: We've got a happy end
subtitles.english: We've got a happy end

subtitles.original: For me and my friends and those who've loved us up until now
subtitles.english: For me and my friends and those who've loved us up until now

subtitles.original: I wanna see you smile
subtitles.english: I wanna see you smile

subtitles.english: Find my way to you somehow

subtitles.english: Take off and fly

subtitles.english: The longer we wait

subtitles.english: Strength to finally defeat

subtitles.english: Yeah! We did it once again!

subtitles.original: And once again, hi guys!
subtitles.english: And once again, hi guys!

subtitles.original: Hi guys!
subtitles.english: Hi guys!

subtitles.original: Yeah, we're off to a flying start already but...
subtitles.english: Yeah, we're off to a flying start already but...

subtitles.original: ...to properly kick things off, welcome everybody

subtitles.original:
to hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Live:
The Show Goes On!
subtitles.english:
to hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Live:
The Show Goes On!

subtitles.original: Welcome everybody!
subtitles.english: Welcome everybody!

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah! Thanks for coming!
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah! Thanks for coming!

subtitles.original:
Yeah, well, well done. Let's start off with
a round of introductions.
subtitles.english:
Yeah, well, well done. Let's start off with
a round of introductions.

subtitles.original: So, who will be first?
subtitles.english: So, who will be first?

subtitles.original: Me! Me! Me!
subtitles.english: Me! Me! Me!

subtitles.original: Let's do it first! Come on!
subtitles.english: Let's do it first! Come on!

subtitles.original: You know the rules and so do I.
subtitles.english: You know the rules and so do I.

subtitles.original: Oh, okay, so it'll be me.
subtitles.english: Oh, okay, so it'll be me.

subtitles.original:
Alright. Kikiriki! Hello everybody, I'm Takanashi
Kiara from hololive English -Myth-.
subtitles.english:
Alright. Kikiriki! Hello everybody, I'm Takanashi
Kiara from hololive English -Myth-.

subtitles.original: You'll hear that a lot today.
subtitles.english: You'll hear that a lot today.

subtitles.original: So, who's next?
subtitles.english: So, who's next?

subtitles.original: A-do-mo-do-mo-do-mo! Same desu!
subtitles.english: A-do-mo-do-mo-do-mo! Same desu!

subtitles.original: Gawr Gura desu! Chark-kun, oh no!
subtitles.english: Gawr Gura desu! Chark-kun, oh no!

subtitles.original: Chark shark, Gawr Gura desu!
subtitles.english: Chark shark, Gawr Gura desu!

subtitles.original: Keep 'em coming, keep 'em coming!
subtitles.english: Keep 'em coming, keep 'em coming!

subtitles.original: Water? Oh me? Okay.
subtitles.english: Water? Oh me? Okay.

subtitles.original:
(Clears throat) Minna-san! Hi, I think you guys
maybe know who I am.
subtitles.english:
(Clears throat) Minna-san! Hi, I think you guys
maybe know who I am.

subtitles.original:
My name is Mori Calliope from
hololive English -Myth-.
subtitles.english:
My name is Mori Calliope from
hololive English -Myth-.

subtitles.original:
I am a virtual singer, artist, creator,
I stream, I play games too.
subtitles.english:
I am a virtual singer, artist, creator,
I stream, I play games too.

subtitles.original:
Nice to meet you if we have already met,
if we haven't, if we have... hi.
subtitles.english:
Nice to meet you if we have already met,
if we haven't, if we have... hi.

subtitles.original:
Someone take the mic away from me, I'm so bad
at these, I'm always so bad, someone else do it.
subtitles.english:
Someone take the mic away from me, I'm so bad
at these, I'm always so bad, someone else do it.

subtitles.original: Who's next? Ame? Ame, perhaps?
subtitles.english: Who's next? Ame? Ame, perhaps?

subtitles.original:
Okay! I'm Amelia Watson, number one detective
from hololive English!
subtitles.english:
Okay! I'm Amelia Watson, number one detective
from hololive English!

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah! And last but not least... Wah!
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah! And last but not least... Wah!

subtitles.original: Wah! Wah! Wah!
subtitles.english: Wah! Wah! Wah!

subtitles.original: Wah! Good morning, afternoon, evening everyone!
subtitles.english: Wah! Good morning, afternoon, evening everyone!

subtitles.original: I'm Ninomae Ina'nis from... oh wait.
subtitles.english: I'm Ninomae Ina'nis from... oh wait.

subtitles.original: I'm Ninomae Ina'nis and together we are...
subtitles.english: I'm Ninomae Ina'nis and together we are...

subtitles.original: hololive English -Myth-!
subtitles.english: hololive English -Myth-!

subtitles.original: We did it! Told you you'll hear it a lot.
subtitles.english: We did it! Told you you'll hear it a lot.

subtitles.original:
So with our introductions out of the way,
feast your eyes on the venue we have today!
subtitles.english:
So with our introductions out of the way,
feast your eyes on the venue we have today!

subtitles.original: Check it out! Whoa! New stage!
subtitles.english: Check it out! Whoa! New stage!

subtitles.original:
Look, a brand new stage made for our
4th anniversary!
subtitles.english:
Look, a brand new stage made for our
4th anniversary!

subtitles.original:
Look at our songs! Our songs are everywhere!
Our originals!
subtitles.english:
Look at our songs! Our songs are everywhere!
Our originals!

subtitles.original: Finally! It was... pretty high!
subtitles.english: Finally! It was... pretty high!

subtitles.original: Look, some Valentine's stuff! Cute!
subtitles.english: Look, some Valentine's stuff! Cute!

subtitles.original: Yeah, I love it. We're stars!
subtitles.english: Yeah, I love it. We're stars!

subtitles.original: That's really, really nice. This stage...
subtitles.english: That's really, really nice. This stage...

subtitles.original: So... um, I'm sure it's obvious, right everybody?
subtitles.english: So... um, I'm sure it's obvious, right everybody?

subtitles.original:
We've got a full divine exquisite...
for 'The Show Goes On'.
subtitles.english:
We've got a full divine exquisite...
for 'The Show Goes On'.

subtitles.original:
Can you guess what the theme is?
Anyone? Anyone?
subtitles.english:
Can you guess what the theme is?
Anyone? Anyone?

subtitles.original: Hai, sensei! Tropical island vacation!
subtitles.english: Hai, sensei! Tropical island vacation!

subtitles.original: No, no, no.
subtitles.english: No, no, no.

subtitles.original: Okay, I got it. Underwater sea adventure!
subtitles.english: Okay, I got it. Underwater sea adventure!

subtitles.original: Are you for real?
subtitles.english: Are you for real?

subtitles.original: What? You asked me! It's definitely that one.
subtitles.english: What? You asked me! It's definitely that one.

subtitles.original:
Okay, no. I don't think they'll have
good answers either, so...
subtitles.english:
Okay, no. I don't think they'll have
good answers either, so...

subtitles.original:
Those two boneheads. Okay, drumroll though.
Come on! Brrrr...
subtitles.english:
Those two boneheads. Okay, drumroll though.
Come on! Brrrr...

subtitles.original: It's Broadway!
subtitles.english: It's Broadway!

subtitles.original: I knew that.
subtitles.english: I knew that.

subtitles.original:
Yeah. And it's not just, you know, a Broadway,
it's also a red carpet!
subtitles.english:
Yeah. And it's not just, you know, a Broadway,
it's also a red carpet!

subtitles.original: Do you like to do a catwalk? Ina? Okay.
subtitles.english: Do you like to do a catwalk? Ina? Okay.

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, yeah! Let's go ladies, let's go!
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah! Let's go ladies, let's go!

subtitles.original: Let's go! Wow! Model walk! Fashion, baby!
subtitles.english: Let's go! Wow! Model walk! Fashion, baby!

subtitles.original:
Nice, that's what I really wanted to do, thanks.
Alright.
subtitles.english:
Nice, that's what I really wanted to do, thanks.
Alright.

subtitles.original: That was pretty cool too.
subtitles.english: That was pretty cool too.

subtitles.original:
So, along with the stunning backdrop, you guys,
I hope you will enjoy our grand performance.
subtitles.english:
So, along with the stunning backdrop, you guys,
I hope you will enjoy our grand performance.

subtitles.original: But it's not just any live concert...
subtitles.english: But it's not just any live concert...

subtitles.original:
We've got a fun surprise waiting for them,
don't we ladies?
subtitles.english:
We've got a fun surprise waiting for them,
don't we ladies?

subtitles.original: Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah!
